name: FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Materials to be used conform with specification
1.2 - Implementation of all measures and controls
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: QMP, TMP, SWMS & WP
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: QMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS, WP
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Removal of any existing unsound,obsolete or redundant pavement markings. Removal of any foreign material or debris.
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Pavement markings to set-out in accordance with IFC Drawings.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Line marking installed as per IFC Drawings
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Glass beads sprinkled/sprayed on to line marking while in a fluid state to ensure embedment. Glass beads to have uniform distribution

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Completed marking shall be uniform in appearance, texture, width and thickness and the surface shall be free from blister, air bubbles, tears, lumps, streats, overlaps, unbeaded areas, tyre marks or other defects. Edges and cuts-offs shall be neat and sharp, and there shall be no visible run-off, overspray, dribbles,splash or spiliage on to the surrounding area, or on to parked or passing vehicles.
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
